name: tracey pooh
body:
Ride Stats:
12 riders (3 were leaders — thanks Chuck!!)
Finish times range: ~6 hours, 10 minutes to ~8 hours, 30 minutes

We had 1 flat near the end (once again to Hunter).

We had 2 riders get severe “jump-off-the-bike-in-pain” cramps in the calves and hamstrings. It was a longer and tougher ride than they were used to and it’s possible food and electrolytes may have added to that. They rallied after large late lunches (with bananas and electrolyte drinks!) in Danville and were able to avoid bailing out early. A+ for persistence and effort!
